Text: thanks for this one! i really love 'em minions! "BANANA!!!"

thanks for the upload.

them looping isn't any trouble.
luckily its very easy to edit avi files (Fast AVI MPEG Splitter is great) to make each of the three clips a separate avi that doesn't loop twice.

bah, i didn't notice it was an mp4.
oh well.  just need to convert it to avi :p
(Don't let the name fool you, [url=http://avidemux.sourceforge.net/]AVIDemux[/url] handles most any format of consequence).

SanctimoniousApe, that program doesn't like h.264 files :p
good idea anyway though
